game_description: With the help of cutting edge physics, full-body kinematics this game lets you immerse yourself in to the role of a assassin for hire. You can either play in melee mode or regular mode. All the AI are active ragdoll you can punch, shoot, grab etc. There is also aim trainer in this game which can help you improve your aim in this game. There are variety of weapons available in this game like bow, knife, guns, crowbar etc. Do you have what it takes to be the best assassin in the world?.

review_5: The game offers a lot of game modes, which is the only good thing about it. It steals the characters from Drunkn Bar Fight. There is 3 underwhelming guns and all of the other weapons have horrible mechanics. The NPCS do not vary much and are too powerful. The maps are also stolen from various games. All of the NCPS also scream the phrase, “The enemy is right there! Shoot!” The game modes are all almost the same. The graphics look like they are from the early 2000s. Don’t buy this. Save up for a better one.
